alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 10:37PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and in eastern New York, the eastern Catskills, mid-Hudson Valley and central and southern Taconics. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute and may impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread from south to north tonight and continue through the day Tuesday before ending by in the early evening. Snowfall rates may reach around half of an inch per hour at times on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
